Description: COFFEEMACHINE TO PRODUCE THE COFFEE AND TAKE A CUP AND PLATE TO INLET OF COFFEE AND MIX BY SPOON
SINK BASIN, SINK, PLATES AND BOWLS ARE WASHED BY DISHSPONGE
TAKE A APPLE WASHED BY SINK AND SLICED BY KNIFE
TAKE A BREAD AND USED BY PAN AND TOASTED BY MICROWAVE
TAKE A PAN AND PUT IN BY EGG TO FRY BY GAS BURNER
TAKE A BOWL AND SLICED BY TOMATO PUT IN BOWL MIXED BY WATER AND ADD PEPPER SHAKER AND MIXED BY SPOON AND PREPARED BY GAS BURNER
TAKE LETTUCE AND SLICED BY KNIFE AND PUT IN BOWL MIXED BY SPOON PREPARED BY GAS BURNER AND ADD SALT SHAKER AND PEPPER SHAKER
TAKE A WATER WITH POT PREPARED BY A GAS BURNER USE BY POT
TAKE A CRACKED EDD AND THROW IT IN THE BIN
TAKE OUT ALL THE FOOD FROM THE FRIDGE AND PUT IT ON THE TABLE
Find the potato. Slice the potato with a knife. Place the potato on a plate. Put the plate in the microwave. Press the time on the microwave.
Find the wine. Fine the cup. Open the bottle of wine. Pour the wine into the cup.
Find the food. Carry the food over to the fridge. Open the fridge and place the food inside.
Find cup. Walk to the sink. Turn on the faucet and fill the cup with water.
Find the potato. Find the pot. Take pot over to the sink and fill it up. Place potato in the pot. Take pot over to the stove. Turn stove on. Place pot on stove.
Find apple slices. Pick the apple slice up. Take apple slices over to the trash can. Place apple slice in the trash can.
Find all kitchen utensils. Place the utensils in the drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_16_7
Description: Take the cup of coffee which was left unused from the kitchen and pour it in sink basin.
FInd the pit. Take pot over to the sink. Dump water from the pot into the sink.
Find the kitchen light. Flip the light switch down.
Find the laptop on the table and turn it on.
Firstly, go to the coffee Table then pick the Remote and turn on the Television. Watch television

Task: Check the timing on the watch_202_7
Description: Go to the watch, take it, and look at it.
FIRST COLLECT THE THINGS YOU WANT TO PACK , OPEN THE BOX , PUT THE THINGS INSIDE THE BOX ACCORDING TO THE RESPECTED SIZE .
LOOK AROUND THE ROOM FIND THE TISSUE BOX CHECK WHETHER IT IS EMPTY , IF EMPTY THROW IT INTO THE BIN

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_204_7
Description: Walk over the desk. Turn the desk lamp to off.
Locate the cell phone. Take the cell phone and smash it against the desk until the screen is cracked.
Locate the cell phone. Use the cell phone.
Remove the pillow from the sofa and place it on the arm chair.
Go to the long table. Pick up the book. Open it.
